prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Synth Lead, Piano, Drums, Brass, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features a combination of Guitar, Synth Lead, Piano, Drums, and Brass, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Synth Lead, Piano, Drums, and Brass, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
Guitar, Synth Lead, Piano, Drums, and Brass are all present in this song, but Bass is absent.
